程序包的使用
com.Leo.Game

  • com.Leo.Game使用的com.Leo.Game中的类 
    类和说明
    Balls
    Mage Fireball The properties of the fireball: the speedX and speedY of the fireball - SpeedX=10,SpeedY=10, the length and width of the fireball - length=10,width=10, the position of the fireball, the direction of the fireball(diretion), whether the fireball is live(live), etc.
    BattleField
    Battlefield interface class Graphical user interface, all the elements of the game can be used for the interface, the interface can accept the user's operation, with human-computer interaction.
    BombHero
    Hero explosion When the bullet is fired onto the tank, it will have an explosion effect.
    Bullets
    Shooter Bullets The properties of the bullets: the Bullets.speedX and Bullets.speedY of the bullets - SpeedX=10,SpeedY=10, the Bullets.length and Bullets.width of the bullets - length=10,width=10, the position of the bullets(Hero.Kdirection), the direction of the bullets(Bullets.diretion), whether the bullets is live(Bullets.live), etc.
    CommonWall
    Common wall Ordinary walls have the following attributes: the fixed length (CommonWall.length) and width(CommonWall.width) of the wall, the position coordinates of the wall(CommonWall.x,CommonWall.y), and the wall is represented by the image added to the graphical user interface.
    Direction
    Enumeration class There are L, U, R, D, STOP indicating five states of left, up, right, down and still.
    GetBlood
    血包类 The blood bag will appear randomly on the battlefield.
    Hero
    Hero abstract class There are two types of heroes, enemy heroes and user-controlled heroes.Both the user side and the enemy hero can fire bullets, which can change the path of walking, and change direction when encountering obstacles such as walls and game boundaries during walking, but not always holding obstacles.
    Home
    Home Class
    Master
    Master class Hero
    MetalWall
    Metal wall The metal wall has the following attributes: the fixed MetalWall.length and MetalWall.width of the wall, the position coordinates of the wall (MetalWall.x,MetalWall.y), and the wall is represented by the image added to the graphical user interface.
    River
    River class The river has the following attributes: the fixed River.riverLength and width of the riverRiver.riverWidth, the location coordinates of the river(River.x,River.y), and the river is represented by the image added to the graphical user interface.
    Timer
    Timer class extend JFrame Use threads to make the timer dynamically display time in the JFrame interface, and the time is accurate to milliseconds The Timer property has a record start time Timer.programStart, a start pause time Timer.pauseStart, a pause total time Timer.pauseCount, and a count thread Timer.thread.
    Timer.CountingThread
    Count thread inherits thread class Modify function Timer.CountingThread.run()
